name: rock-paper-liar
description:
Online rock paper scissors but there are 2 rounds:

The first round: pick an option to discard.

The second round: pick your actual choice. If you lie and pick the choice that you said you would discard, you have the opportunity to win more points. But careful! If your opponent also lies, and if you lose then you can lose more points!

Since this game is online multiplayer, you won't be able to play unless someone else is online at the same time. Share the link with a friend to begin your game!
